I do still play this game, but unfortunately i can not recommend this.

There are a few problems:

1. I would say in the Old days before CS:GO went f2p  it already hat a cheater/hacker problem, but with it 
    being f2p  in every 3rd game i join there seems to be a Hacker/Cheater.  It seems like this is a bigger 
    problem in the lower ranks (silver; Gold Nova) which brings me to the next problem

2. The Ranking system is just retarded. I play with a few Friends which are both Gold Nova 3 and i can easily 
    keep up, but still am Silver 3. (yes, i do know how the ELO system works) 

3. Smurfing. I understand there is the willingness to play against worst opponents, and to be honest, 
    smurfing in general is not my problem at all, but the frequency nowadays there are more smurfs in silver 
    than actual silvers that i do consider a problem.

Thank you for your time
